title: Ghosts Without Shadows
outcome: With BCI legitimacy shattered, the system's restored 'ghosts' use their untracked status to disrupt old power structures. Over two weeks, they coordinate subversive actions and leak further evidence of abuses. Fearful of losing control, officials attempt to impose new tracking, but the ghosts erase re-identification logs. The city is permanently changed: trust and suspicion blend, as no one knows who is invisible or fully accountable ever again.

events.description: Restored 'ghosts' coordinate anonymously, using their lack of BCI tracking to undermine attempts by officials to reassert digital control.
A series of hacks disables renewed tracking features, fueling anxiety as the population realizes many could now be invisible to the system for good.
Evidence of old abuses continues to leak, triggering confrontations between neighbors and former officials as fear and suspicion disrupt daily routines.
Officials admit they can no longer restore full tracking. Citizens are forced to confront a reality where true accountability is impossible—and freedom and paranoia might always coexist.
